name: Disscaveira
description:
This  game was made for the LowRez Jam 2019 on a time span of about 2 week.

Disscaveira is a LowRez MetroidVania game where the player must travel trought the land of Caveira in order to Discover power up to be strong enough to beat the obstacle that is blocking your way in order to obtain the magical Crystal that lies underneath the land.

Controls:

  • Z = Jump
  • X = Shot
  • Arrow key = Movement / Selection
  • Space = Select
  • Enter = Pause
